me wanodayanaye ek mayimak indiyan sagaraya kiyala mama kalin kiwwane.ithin ee haraha lankawe aarya sinhala janawasa thibunu bawata pahadili sadakath bohomayak wilpaththuwe pihita thiyanawa.kastiyama ahala athine wijaya rajjuruwo enakota kuweni kapu katimin indapu thambapanniya..onna oyalath wilpaththu enawa nam thambapanni yannath puluwan.ee ithihasika watina kama.ee wagema waw ganga ala dola diya ulpath wagema wanodyanaya wata athi willu samuhayakin yukthayi..me wanodyanayata wilpaththu wa kiyala nama labennath hethuwa willu samuhayak thibnu nisa bawayi dana ganna labne.willu 40k pamana thiyana bawa thamayi dana ganna labune ee athara karadiya miridiya kiwuldiya willu athulath.kokkariya saha lunuwila kiyanne ee karadiya willu.demata wila willu wa pradana kiwuldiya willu wak.

lama apayojana sambandha paminili paya 24 k athulatha nithipathi departhamenthuwata danum dime nawa krama wedayak polis lama kantha karyanshaya mangin aarambha kara thibe.ewani paminili sambandha warthawak idiripath wu sanin nithipathi departhamenthuwe niranthara awadhanaya yomu karana athara eewaye wimarshana wartha kadinamin laba dima kerehi adala aayathana kriyathmaka karawima nawa kramawedaye aramuna weyi.daruwan dwithika windithabhawayata lakwima (nawatha nawatha kayika ha manasika apayojanayata lak wima) walakwima, winditha daruwange anagathaya surakshitha kirima ha ema daruwanta kadinamin sadharanaya itu kara dima aramunu karaganimin gampaha, anuradhapura, polonnaruwa, yapanaya, madakalapuwa, thangalla, hambanthota, rathnapura saha ambailipitiya polis bala pradeshawala aarambha kara athi niyamu wyapruthiyata samagamiwa mema nawa wadapiliwela aarambha kara thibe.paminiliwala wartha, nithipathi departhamenthuwa, jathika lama aarakshaka adhikariya saha polis aparadha kottasayata yomu kerena athara nithipathi departhamenthuwa mangin eeta adala kriyamargawalata kadinamin awathirna wana bawa polis lama kantha karyanshaye adhyaksha jayantha wikramasinha mahatha dinamina ta eeye (04) pawasiya.ihatha niyamu wyapruthiya yatathe polis lama ha kantha karyansha eekaka mangin daruwange paminili wimarshanaya kramawedaya 2011 wasare di aarambha wi athi athara wartha wana paminiliwala wimarshana wartha laba ganime karyakshamathawayak athi kirima thulin, mema winditha daruwange samaja gatalu athiwima walakena bawa da ee mahatha prakasha kaleya.adhikarana amathyanshaya, saukhya amathyanshaya da parikshana wartha laba demin me wadapiliwela sandaha wishesha sahayogayak laba dena bawa da hethema kiya.meya idiriye di dipawyapthawa kriyathmaka karana bawath paminili wimarshanaya kota sadharanaya itu kirime kriyawalika karyakshama kirima wenuwen dirgha sakachchawakin anathuruwa me thiranaya gath bawath ee mahatha prakasha kaleya.
